message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Let me know what you think!

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate you're interested in the product. While I understand your position, $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to compromise, though. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? This would still be a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit. What do you say?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $10,250. I think this is a fair price for both of us. Let me know what you think!
